channel.title: Science News
channel.description: Get the latest BBC Science and Environment News: breaking news, analysis and debate on science and nature in the UK and around the world.

item.title: Panel supports commercial space
item.description: Experts reviewing the US space programme back using commercial services to launch astronauts.

item.title: Energy reports 'a waste of time'
item.description: A former Tomorrow's World presenter brands the system used to assess the energy efficiency of homes as "insane".

item.title: 'Most distant' galaxy group spied
item.description: Scientists identify a group of galaxies said to be at a record distance of 10.2 billion light-years away from Earth.

item.title: Green skyscraper
item.description: China tower blazes a path in green building technology

item.title: Earth Watch
item.description: Copenhagen climate countdown: Deal or no deal?
